# Library

```{r}
library(Matrix)
library(ggplot2)
library(gghighlight)
library(tidyverse)

library(STdeconvolve)
library(SpatialExperiment)
library(lemur)
library(igraph)

```

```{r}
source("../src/util.R")
```

```{r}
# Define the coordinates as a matrix
coordinates <- matrix(c(
  0, 0, 1, 0, 2, 0,
  0, 1, 1, 1, 2, 1,
  0, 2, 1, 2, 2, 2,
  0, 3, 1, 3, 2, 3
), ncol = 2, byrow = TRUE)

```

```{r}
adjacency.matrix <- get.adjacency.matrix(coordinates, nei.diff = c(-1, 0, 1))
sum(adjacency.matrix)

# build a graph
g <- graph_from_adjacency_matrix(adjacency.matrix, mode = 'undirected')
components(g)

g <- add_vertices(g, 3)
plot(g)
```

```{r}
to <- c(2, 4, 10)
from <- 1:15
from
to
min.dists.mat <- get.min.dists.mat(g, from, to)
```
